001package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.bungee;
002
003import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.common.FileUtils;
004import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.common.Yaml;
005import net.md_5.bungee.config.Configuration;
006import net.md_5.bungee.config.ConfigurationProvider;
007import net.md_5.bungee.config.YamlConfiguration;
008import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
009import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
010
011import java.io.IOException;
012import java.nio.file.Path;
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014import java.util.Collection;
015import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Objects;
018
019/**
020 * This class implements {@link Yaml} on BungeeCord.
021 * <p>
022 * Using null for @NotNull argument will cause a {@link NullPointerException}.
023 */
024public class BungeeYaml implements Yaml {
025
026    protected final Path filePath;
027    protected Configuration config;
028
029    /**
030     * Creates an {@link BungeeYaml} with no default values.
031     * <p>
032     * This constructor loads the file automatically.
033     *
034     * @param filePath File path to load or save.
035     */
036    public BungeeYaml(@NotNull Path filePath) {
037        this(filePath, true);
038    }
039
040    /**
041     * Creates an {@link BungeeYaml} with no default values.
042     *
043     * @param filePath File path to load or save.
044     * @param autoLoad True if automatically load, false otherwise.
045     */
046    public BungeeYaml(@NotNull Path filePath, boolean autoLoad) {
047        Objects.requireNonNull(filePath, "filePath must not be null.");
048
049        this.filePath = filePath;
050        if (autoLoad) load();
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Loads a yaml file.
055     * <p>
056     * If a yaml file is not found, this method will create one.
057     *
058     * @return True if the load is successful or false if it is failure.
059     */
060    @Override
061    public boolean load() {
062        if (FileUtils.checkFile(filePath)) {
063            try {
064                config = ConfigurationProvider.getProvider(YamlConfiguration.class).load(filePath.toFile());
065                return true;
066            } catch (IOException e) {
067                e.printStackTrace();
068            }
069        }
070        return false;
071
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * Checks if the file is loaded.
076     *
077     * @return True if the file is loaded or false if it is not loaded.
078     */
079    @Override
080    public boolean isLoaded() {
081        return config != null;
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Save to yaml file.
086     * <p>
087     * If a yaml file is not found, this method will create one.
088     *
089     * @return True if the save is successful or false if it is failure.
090     */
091    @Override
092    public boolean save() {
093        try {
094            if (FileUtils.checkFile(filePath)) {
095                ConfigurationProvider.getProvider(YamlConfiguration.class).save(getConfig(), filePath.toFile());
096                return true;
097            }
098        } catch (IOException e) {
099            e.printStackTrace();
100        }
101        return false;
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Get the path to a yaml file.
106     *
107     * @return The path to a yaml file.
108     */
109    @Override
110    @NotNull
111    public Path getPath() {
112        return filePath;
113    }
114
115    /**
116     * Gets {@link Configuration}.
117     *
118     * @return {@link Configuration}
119     * @throws IllegalStateException Throws when a yaml file is not loaded.
120     */
121    @NotNull
122    public Configuration getConfig() throws IllegalStateException {
123        if (isLoaded()) {
124            return config;
125        } else {
126            throw new IllegalStateException("A yaml file is not loaded.");
127        }
128    }
129
130    /**
131     * Gets the requested boolean by path.
132     * <p>
133     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns {@code false}.
134     *
135     * @param path Path of the boolean to get.
136     * @return Requested boolean.
137     */
138    @Override
139    public boolean getBoolean(@NotNull String path) {
140        return getBoolean(path, false);
141    }
142
143    /**
144     * Gets the requested boolean by path.
145     *
146     * @param path Path of the boolean to get.
147     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
148     * @return Requested boolean.
149     */
150    @Override
151    public boolean getBoolean(@NotNull String path, boolean def) {
152        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
153        return isLoaded() ? config.getBoolean(path, def) : def;
154    }
155
156    /**
157     * Gets the requested double by path.
158     * <p>
159     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns 0.
160     *
161     * @param path Path of the double to get.
162     * @return Requested double.
163     */
164    @Override
165    public double getDouble(@NotNull String path) {
166        return getDouble(path, 0);
167    }
168
169    /**
170     * Gets the requested double by path.
171     *
172     * @param path Path of the double to get.
173     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
174     * @return Requested double.
175     */
176    @Override
177    public double getDouble(@NotNull String path, double def) {
178        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
179        return isLoaded() ? config.getDouble(path, def) : def;
180    }
181
182    /**
183     * Gets the requested integer by path.
184     * <p>
185     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns 0.
186     *
187     * @param path Path of the integer to get.
188     * @return Requested integer.
189     */
190    @Override
191    public int getInt(@NotNull String path) {
192        return getInt(path, 0);
193    }
194
195    /**
196     * Gets the requested integer by path.
197     *
198     * @param path Path of the integer to get.
199     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
200     * @return Requested integer.
201     */
202    @Override
203    public int getInt(@NotNull String path, int def) {
204        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
205        return isLoaded() ? config.getInt(path, def) : def;
206    }
207
208    /**
209     * Gets the requested long by path.
210     * <p>
211     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns 0.
212     *
213     * @param path Path of the long to get.
214     * @return Requested long.
215     */
216    @Override
217    public long getLong(@NotNull String path) {
218        return getLong(path, 0);
219    }
220
221    /**
222     * Gets the requested long by path.
223     *
224     * @param path Path of the long to get.
225     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
226     * @return Requested long.
227     */
228    @Override
229    public long getLong(@NotNull String path, long def) {
230        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
231        return isLoaded() ? config.getLong(path, def) : def;
232    }
233
234    /**
235     * Gets the requested string by path.
236     * <p>
237     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty string.
238     *
239     * @param path Path of the string to get.
240     * @return Requested string.
241     */
242    @Override
243    @NotNull
244    public String getString(@NotNull String path) {
245        return getString(path, "");
246    }
247
248    /**
249     * Gets the requested string by path.
250     *
251     * @param path Path of the string to get.
252     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
253     * @return Requested string.
254     */
255    @Override
256    @NotNull
257    public String getString(@NotNull String path, @NotNull String def) {
258        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
259        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
260
261        String value = isLoaded() ? config.getString(path, def) : null;
262        return value != null ? value : def;
263    }
264
265    /**
266     * Gets the requested string list by path.
267     * <p>
268     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty string list.
269     *
270     * @param path Path of the string list to get.
271     * @return Requested string list.
272     */
273    @Override
274    @NotNull
275    public List<String> getStringList(@NotNull String path) {
276        return getStringList(path, new ArrayList<>());
277    }
278
279    /**
280     * Gets the requested string list by path.
281     *
282     * @param path Path of the string list to get.
283     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
284     * @return Requested string list.
285     */
286    @Override
287    @NotNull
288    public List<String> getStringList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<String> def) {
289        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
290        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
291        return isLoaded() ? config.getStringList(path) : def;
292    }
293
294    /**
295     * Gets the requested short list by path.
296     * <p>
297     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty short list.
298     *
299     * @param path Path of the short list to get.
300     * @return Requested short list.
301     */
302    @Override
303    @NotNull
304    public List<Short> getShortList(@NotNull String path) {
305        return getShortList(path, new ArrayList<>());
306    }
307
308    /**
309     * Gets the requested short list by path.
310     *
311     * @param path Path of the short list to get.
312     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
313     * @return Requested short list.
314     */
315    @Override
316    @NotNull
317    public List<Short> getShortList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Short> def) {
318        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
319        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
320        return isLoaded() ? config.getShortList(path) : def;
321    }
322
323    /**
324     * Gets the requested integer list by path.
325     * <p>
326     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty integer list.
327     *
328     * @param path Path of the integer list to get.
329     * @return Requested integer list.
330     */
331    @Override
332    @NotNull
333    public List<Integer> getIntegerList(@NotNull String path) {
334        return getIntegerList(path, new ArrayList<>());
335    }
336
337    /**
338     * Gets the requested integer list by path.
339     *
340     * @param path Path of the integer list to get.
341     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
342     * @return Requested integer list.
343     */
344    @Override
345    @NotNull
346    public List<Integer> getIntegerList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Integer> def) {
347        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
348        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
349        return isLoaded() ? config.getIntList(path) : def;
350    }
351
352    /**
353     * Gets the requested long list by path.
354     * <p>
355     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty long list.
356     *
357     * @param path Path of the long list to get.
358     * @return Requested long list.
359     */
360    @Override
361    @NotNull
362    public List<Long> getLongList(@NotNull String path) {
363        return getLongList(path, new ArrayList<>());
364    }
365
366    /**
367     * Gets the requested long list by path.
368     *
369     * @param path Path of the long list to get.
370     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
371     * @return Requested long list.
372     */
373    @Override
374    @NotNull
375    public List<Long> getLongList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Long> def) {
376        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
377        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
378        return isLoaded() ? config.getLongList(path) : def;
379    }
380
381    /**
382     * Gets the requested float list by path.
383     * <p>
384     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty float list.
385     *
386     * @param path Path of the float list to get.
387     * @return Requested float list.
388     */
389    @Override
390    @NotNull
391    public List<Float> getFloatList(@NotNull String path) {
392        return getFloatList(path, new ArrayList<>());
393    }
394
395    /**
396     * Gets the requested float list by path.
397     *
398     * @param path Path of the float list to get.
399     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
400     * @return Requested float list.
401     */
402    @Override
403    @NotNull
404    public List<Float> getFloatList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Float> def) {
405        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
406        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
407        return isLoaded() ? config.getFloatList(path) : def;
408    }
409
410    /**
411     * Gets the requested double list by path.
412     * <p>
413     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty double list.
414     *
415     * @param path Path of the double list to get.
416     * @return Requested double list.
417     */
418    @Override
419    @NotNull
420    public List<Double> getDoubleList(@NotNull String path) {
421        return getDoubleList(path, new ArrayList<>());
422    }
423
424    /**
425     * Gets the requested double list by path.
426     *
427     * @param path Path of the double list to get.
428     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
429     * @return Requested double list.
430     */
431    @Override
432    @NotNull
433    public List<Double> getDoubleList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Double> def) {
434        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
435        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
436        return isLoaded() ? config.getDoubleList(path) : def;
437    }
438
439    /**
440     * Gets a set containing keys in this yaml file.
441     * <p>
442     * The returned set does not include deep key.
443     *
444     * @return Set of keys contained within this yaml file.
445     */
446    @Override
447    @NotNull
448    public Collection<String> getKeys() {
449        return isLoaded() ? config.getKeys() : new LinkedHashSet<>();
450    }
451
452    /**
453     * Set the value to the specified path.
454     * <p>
455     * If given value is null, the path will be removed.
456     * If you want to save it to a file, call {@link BungeeYaml#save()}.
457     *
458     * @param path  Path of the object to set.
459     * @param value New value to set the path to.
460     */
461    @Override
462    public void set(@NotNull String path, @Nullable Object value) {
463        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
464        if (isLoaded()) config.set(path, value);
465    }
466}
